title: Matt Ryan, Nick Foles, Doug Pederson, Dak Prescott, and the Steelers
itunes:title: Matt Ryan, Nick Foles, Doug Pederson, Dak Prescott, and the Steelers
description:
Colin discusses the issues with Atlanta Falcons QB Matt Ryan, why Philadelphia Eagles QB Nick Foles and HC Doug Pederson work well together, why there isn't much pressure on Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott, and how Pittsburgh Steelers HC Mike Tomlin is handling his team. Guests include Bryan Cox, Bucky Brooks, Joe Thomas, Greg Jennings, and Jeff Pearlman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
